description:
I try to delete an old created network but , nothing happens I have tried all commands

nova-manage project scrub openstackDemo

nova-manage network modify 192.168.110.32/27 --disassociate-project

nova-manage network delete 192.168.110.32/27 gives me the following output:

2012-08-01 16:33:33 DEBUG nova.utils [req-866f226f-aac5-4ff3-8ccb-8f0f319a7512 None None] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=9033) __get_backend /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/utils.py:658
Command failed, please check log for more info
2012-08-01 16:33:33 CRITICAL nova [req-866f226f-aac5-4ff3-8ccb-8f0f319a7512 None None] Network 2 is still in use.
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova Traceback (most recent call last):
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1746, in <module>
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     main()
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1733, in main
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     fn(*fn_args, **fn_kwargs)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 871, in delete
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     fixed_range, uuid)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/network/manager.py", line 257, in wrapped
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     return func(self, context, *args, **kwargs)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/network/manager.py", line 1425, in delete_network
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     self.db.network_delete_safe(context, network.id)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/api.py", line 740, in network_delete_safe
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     return IMPL.network_delete_safe(context, network_id)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 102, in wrapper
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     return f(*args, **kwargs)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 1907, in network_delete_safe
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     raise exception.NetworkInUse(network_id=network_id)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova NetworkInUse: Network 2 is still in use.
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova 

I have deleted all instances, I have restarted my servers , but nothing 

and when I want to list networks this is what happens:

id   	IPv4              	IPv6           	start address  	DNS1           	DNS2           	VlanID         	project        	uuid           
2012-08-01 16:34:52 DEBUG nova.utils [req-349618b5-a45b-4c92-b7cf-2b87f0f00691 None None] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=9088) __get_backend /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/utils.py:658
2    	192.168.110.32/27 	None           	192.168.110.34 	8.8.4.4        	None           	None           	None           	0cf5696a-6205-4357-84d0-fc7b9122599b
title: cannot delete  network

comments.content:
I try to delete an old created network but , nothing happens I have tried all commands

nova-manage project scrub openstackDemo

nova-manage network modify 192.168.110.32/27 --disassociate-project

nova-manage network delete 192.168.110.32/27 gives me the following output:

2012-08-01 16:33:33 DEBUG nova.utils [req-866f226f-aac5-4ff3-8ccb-8f0f319a7512 None None] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=9033) __get_backend /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/utils.py:658
Command failed, please check log for more info
2012-08-01 16:33:33 CRITICAL nova [req-866f226f-aac5-4ff3-8ccb-8f0f319a7512 None None] Network 2 is still in use.
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova Traceback (most recent call last):
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1746, in <module>
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     main()
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1733, in main
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     fn(*fn_args, **fn_kwargs)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 871, in delete
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     fixed_range, uuid)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/network/manager.py", line 257, in wrapped
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     return func(self, context, *args, **kwargs)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/network/manager.py", line 1425, in delete_network
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     self.db.network_delete_safe(context, network.id)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/api.py", line 740, in network_delete_safe
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     return IMPL.network_delete_safe(context, network_id)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 102, in wrapper

2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 1907, in network_delete_safe
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova     raise exception.NetworkInUse(network_id=network_id)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova NetworkInUse: Network 2 is still in use.
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova 

I have deleted all instances, I have restarted my servers , but nothing 

and when I want to list networks this is what happens:

id   	IPv4              	IPv6           	start address  	DNS1           	DNS2           	VlanID         	project        	uuid           
2012-08-01 16:34:52 DEBUG nova.utils [req-349618b5-a45b-4c92-b7cf-2b87f0f00691 None None] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=9088) __get_backend /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/utils.py:658

comments.content:
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova raise exception.NetworkInUse(network_id=network_id)
2012-08-01 16:33:33 TRACE nova NetworkInUse: Network 2 is still in use.

check your nova db to make sure whether the Network is still in use .
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~heut2008
